field.description: Data Cache Flush in Progress (not in FT)

field.description: Data Cache Store Buffer Busy (not in FT)

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 0 Enable - sampling at first edge, first edge is rising

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 1 Enable - sampling at second edge, first edge is rising

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 2 Enable - sampling at first edge, first edge is falling

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 3 Enable - sampling at second edge, first edge is falling

field.name: TXDREIE
field.description: Transmit Data Register Empty Interrupt Enable

field.name: RDRFIE
field.description: Receive Data Register Empty Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValue.name: MODE0
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 0 Enable - sampling at first edge, first edge is rising

enumeratedValue.name: MODE1
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 1 Enable - sampling at second edge, first edge is rising

enumeratedValue.name: MODE2
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 2 Enable - sampling at first edge, first edge is falling

enumeratedValue.name: MODE3
enumeratedValue.description: SPI Mode 3 Enable - sampling at second edge, first edge is falling

field.name: TXDREIE
field.description: Transmit Data Register Empty Interrupt Enable

field.name: RDRFIE

enumeratedValue.name: RESTART
enumeratedValue.description: update registers with "BUFFERED" values and restart counting

enumeratedValue.name: RESTART
enumeratedValue.description: update registers with "BUFFERED" values and restart counting

enumeratedValue.name: RESTART
enumeratedValue.description: update registers with "BUFFERED" values and restart counting

enumeratedValue.name: RESTART
enumeratedValue.description: update registers with "BUFFERED" values and restart counting

enumeratedValue.name: IDLE
enumeratedValue.description: I2C bus is idle (no transmission in progress)

enumeratedValue.name: OWNED
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Master owns the bus (performs transmission)

enumeratedValue.name: ACK
enumeratedValue.description: Continue current transmission if stopped (for any reason)

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Terminates current transmission immediately (within the I2C protocol)

enumeratedValue.name: RESET
enumeratedValue.description: Resets module configuration to the initial state

field.name: TXDREIE
field.description: Transmit Data Register Empty Interrupt Enable

field.name: RDRFIE
field.description: Receive Data Register Empty Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValue.name: CLR_TDR
enumeratedValue.description: CLR TDR command is pending/in progress

enumeratedValue.name: CLR_RDR
enumeratedValue.description: CLR RDR command is pending/in progress

enumeratedValue.name: ACK
enumeratedValue.description: Continues current operation when stopped (for any reason) - used only with automatic transmission disabled

enumeratedValue.name: STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Terminates the current transmission (within the I2C protocol)

enumeratedValue.name: CLR_TDR
enumeratedValue.description: Invalidate and clear the content of TDR register

enumeratedValue.name: CLR_RDR
enumeratedValue.description: Invalidate and clear te content of RDR register

field.name: TXDREIE
field.description: Transmit Data Register Empty Interrupt Enable

field.name: RDRFIE
field.description: Receive Data Register Empty Interrupt Enable
